question: Who among the following famous personalities had started a magazine called “Lisan-ul-Sidq’” ?
explanation: Maulana Abul Kalam Azad started his full fledged journalistic career by launching the journal named Lisan-ul-Sidaq. It was published between 1903 and 1905. H ealso published Al-Hilala in 1912 and Al-Balagh in 1914.
